mapper.sql: id, name, class_size, is_delete, create_time, update_time, op_user_id, op_user_name, op_role_name
mapper.delete: update zm_class set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zm_class set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_size = #{classSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, op_user_id = #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, op_user_name = #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_role_name = #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from zm_class
and is_delete = 1
and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and op_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{opUserName},'%')
